tagline: Shortcuts to make your sublime experience blazingly fast.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Sublime-superpowers
body:
# Sublime Superpowers	

A bunch of shortcuts for sublime that will save you tons of time.

## Installation
	cd ~/Library/Application\ Support/Sublime\ Text\ 2/Packages/User
	git clone git://github.com/saidurh/Sublime-SuperPowers.git
